title: NS: NA (New-Series: new article)
content:
A new article by Andy Crewdson sure to make any type freak slobber:   
 [http://www.new-series.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018033311/http:/www.new-series.org/)   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: I wanted to second this mention. Having just finished reading it myself, it is an excellent article. It is definitely an article for fan's of Fred Smeijer's work.

Since "THIS IS NOT A DISCUSSION AREA", please walk this way, Miss Wardle...   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/2689.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018033311/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/2689.html)
